== Alamcode (CT) (627564) ==

Alamcode (CT) is a town in the [[Ponnani]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 20.48 sq. km. and harbouring 7050 households with total population of 33918 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 65 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 350 km. Male population is 15798 and female population is 18120. Scheduled Caste population is 3960 and Scheduled Tribes population is 31. Census Location Code of the town is 627564<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 65 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Kuttippuram at a distance of 10 km.
